item.description:
In French with English subtitles.  Meet in the lobby by 7:15.  If people are interested, we can go for drinks after the movie. 

Please keep your RSVP updated.  If you say that you're coming and later find out that you won't make it after all, please change your RSVP.  It's really helpful for me to know how many people are coming.

I sent an email to everyone in the group with details about how to get tickets, more information about the movie, how to get to the theater, etc.  If you'd like me to send it to you again, use the link next to "Who's hosting?"

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group
